title: The Ball Valve Transformation â€“ GF Piping Systems expands its line of Pro Ball Valves - GF Piping Systems - Cision News
summary: GF Piping Systems introduces new Pro Ball Valves, the 523 Pro and 546 Linear Pro, offering state-of-the-art solutions for Process Automation, featuring corrosion-free materials, various actuation options, and automation interfaces suitable for different actuators. The valves have lockable levers, reinforced stems, Data-Matrix-Codes for traceability, and additional options like LED feedback sensors and dead-man levers for safety. These products enhance valve technology with precise flow control and sampling capabilities.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 332919 - Other Metal Valve and Pipe Fitting Manufacturing, 333249 - Other Industrial Machinery Manufacturing, 333996 - Fluid Power Pump and Motor Manufacturing, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services
